# Grid

The Grid (str-grid) is a container designed on mobile-first flexbox system for building custom layouts. A layout based on a 12 columns by default, but could be easily customized to any number via CSS customization. Columns will expand to fill the row, and will resize to fit additional columns.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                           | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `fixed`  | `fixed`   | If `true`, the grid will have a fixed width based on the screen size. | `boolean` | `false` |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                    | Description                           |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| `--str-grid-padding`    | Padding for the Grid                  |
| `--str-grid-padding-lg` | Padding for the Grid on lg screens    |
| `--str-grid-padding-md` | Padding for the Grid on md screens    |
| `--str-grid-padding-sm` | Padding for the Grid on sm screens    |
| `--str-grid-padding-xl` | Padding for the Grid on xl screens    |
| `--str-grid-padding-xs` | Padding for the Grid on xs screens    |
| `--str-grid-width`      | Width of the fixed Grid               |
| `--str-grid-width-lg`   | Width of the fixed Grid on lg screens |
| `--str-grid-width-md`   | Width of the fixed Grid on md screens |
| `--str-grid-width-sm`   | Width of the fixed Grid on sm screens |
| `--str-grid-width-xl`   | Width of the fixed Grid on xl screens |
| `--str-grid-width-xs`   | Width of the fixed Grid on xs screens |
